member.name: T:Rebex.Net.Pop3
member.summary: Provides methods for communication with POP3 servers.
member.remarks: All members of this class are thread-safe.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3.DefaultPort
member.summary: Default POP3 port (110).

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3.DefaultImplicitSslPort
member.summary: Default POP3/Implicit SSL port (995).

member.name: E:Rebex.Net.Pop3.ResponseRead
member.summary: Occurs when a response is received from the server.

member.name: E:Rebex.Net.Pop3.CommandSent
member.summary: Occurs when a command is send to the server.

member.name: E:Rebex.Net.Pop3.TransferProgress
member.summary: Occurs when data is send or received.

member.name: E:Rebex.Net.Pop3.ValidatingCertificate
member.summary: Occurs when a server certificate needs to be validated.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.OnResponseRead(Rebex.Net.Pop3ResponseReadEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the event.
member.param: A that contains the event data.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.OnCommandSent(Rebex.Net.Pop3CommandSentEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the event.
member.param: A that contains the event data.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.OnTransferProgress(Rebex.Net.Pop3TransferProgressEventArgs)
member.summary: Raises the event.
member.param: A that contains the event data.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the Pop3 class.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes the object and all the socket objects.
member.remarks: Calling this method ensures that all resources are freed.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.
member.param: true to release both managed and unmanaged resources; false to release only unmanaged resources.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.Finalize
member.summary: Finalizer. Called by garbage collector during object destruction.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.Abort
member.summary: Aborts the current operation.

remarks.p: The aborted operation will end either successfully, or with of status OperationAborted or Timeout. The object may remain in Reading, Sending or Processing state. In this case, the object is not usable any more and a call to is recommended.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.Connect(System.String)
member.summary: Connects to the POP3 server.
member.param: The server address - either a hostname or a dotted string address.
member.returns: The welcome message returned by the server.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.Connect(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Connects to the POP3 server.
member.param: The server address - either a hostname or a dotted string address.
The server port (e.g. 110).
member.returns: The welcome message returned by the server.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.Connect(System.String,Rebex.Net.SslMode)
member.summary: Connects to the POP3 server with the specified security. Use a port corresponding to the specified security mode.
member.param: The server address - either a hostname or a dotted string IP address.
Connection security.
member.returns: The welcome message returned by the server.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.Connect(System.String,System.Int32,Rebex.Net.SslMode)
member.summary: Connects to the POP3 server with the specified security.
member.param: The server address - either a hostname or a dotted string IP address.
The server port (e.g. 110).
Connection security.
member.returns: The welcome message returned by the server.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.Disconnect(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Deletes any messages marked as deleted and terminate the connection.
member.param: True if messages marked as deleted should be left on the server.
member.returns: The exit message returned by the server.
member.remarks: Represents POP3 QUIT command, with optional preceding RSET.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.Secure
member.summary: Secures the connection with TLS/SSL using default parameters.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.Login(System.String,System.String,Rebex.Net.Pop3Authentication)
member.summary: Authenticates the user to the POP3 server using the specified authentication method.
member.param: User name.
Password.
Authentication method.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.Undelete
member.summary: Unmarks any messages that have been marked as deleted.
member.remarks: Represents POP3 RSET command.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.Delete(System.Int32)
member.summary: Marks a message as deleted. Messages marked as deleted will actually be deleted after a call to method.
member.param: The sequence number of the message to delete.

remarks.p: Represents POP3 DELE command.
Use method to unmarked messages marked as deleted.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.GetMessageList(Rebex.Net.Pop3ListFields)
member.summary: Retrieves a list of messages in the mailbox.
member.param: Specifies the scope of information to determine about each message.
member.returns: The list of messages.
member.remarks: Uses either POP3 LIST command, UIDL command, or a combination of both.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.GetMessageHeaders(System.Int32,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Downloads the headers of a message with a specified number from the server and writes it into a supplied stream.
member.param: The sequence number of the message to download headers from.
Stream that will receive the message headers.
member.remarks: "Uses POP3 "TOP 1" command to retrieve the headers.
member.returns: The length of the headers in bytes.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.GetMessageInfo(System.Int32,Rebex.Net.Pop3ListFields)
member.summary: Gets information about a message with the specified sequence number.
member.param: Message sequence number.
Specifies the scope of information to determine about each message.
member.returns: A message info.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.SendCommand(System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Sends a custom command to the POP3 server.
member.param: Command (e.g. "HELP").
Indicates whether the response for the command is multiline or single line.

remarks.p: Must be followed by either one or more calls to ReadResponse method, depending on the value of multiline parameter.
Use ReadResponse and SendCommand to implement various custom commands.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.ReadResponse
member.summary: Returns a single line of response of the POP3 server to the command.
member.returns: Response of the POP3 server.

remarks.p: Use ReadResponse and SendCommand to implement various custom commands.
If the response is multiline, ReadResponse must be called multiple times until it returns null, which indicates an and of response.
If the response is single line, ReadResponse must be called only once.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of this object.
member.returns: A string representing this object

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.Login(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Authenticates the user to the POP3 server.
member.param: User name.
Password.
member.remarks: This method tries to authenticate using one of the following methods in this order of preference: CRAM-MD5, DIGEST-MD5, APOP, PLAIN, LOGIN, ClearText.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.Disconnect
member.summary: Deletes any messages marked as deleted and terminates the connection.
member.returns: The exit message returned by the server.
member.remarks: Represents POP3 QUIT command.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.GetMessage(System.Int32,System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Downloads the message with a specified number from the server and writes its data into a supplied stream.
member.param: The sequence number of the message to download.
Stream that will receive the message.
member.remarks: Represents POP3 RETR command.
member.returns: The length of the message in bytes.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.GetMessageList
member.summary: Retrieves a list of messages in the mailbox with unique IDs and lengths.
member.returns: The list of messages.
member.remarks: Uses a combination of POP3 LIST and UIDL commands.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.GetMessage(System.Int32,System.String)
member.summary: Downloads the message with a specified number from the server and writes its data into a local file.
member.param: The sequence number of the message to download.
The path of the local file. This cannot be a directory.
member.remarks: Represents POP3 RETR command.
member.returns: The length of the message in bytes.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.GetMessageCount
member.summary: Retrieve the number of messages in the mailbox.
member.returns: Number of messages.

remarks.p: Uses POP3 STAT command.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.GetMailboxSize
member.summary: Retrieve the size of the mailbox - the sum of lengths of all messages.
member.returns: Mailbox size.

remarks.p: Uses POP3 STAT command.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.GetMimeMessage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Downloads a message with a specified number from the server and loads it into an instance of .
member.param: The sequence number of the message to download.
member.remarks: Represents POP3 RETR command.
member.returns: A downloaded message.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.GetMailMessage(System.Int32)
member.summary: Downloads a message with a specified number from the server and loads it into an instance of .
member.param: The sequence number of the message to download.
member.remarks: Represents POP3 RETR command.
member.returns: A downloaded message.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.GetMessageSequenceNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Converts a unique ID to sequence number. Returns the sequence number of the specified message, or null (Nothing in VB.NET) if not found.
member.param: Unique ID of the message.
member.returns: Sequence number of the specified message, or null (Nothing in VB.NET) if not found.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3.Proxy
member.summary: Gets or sets the network proxy to use to access a remote server.
member.value: The to use to access a remote server.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.SetSocketFactory(Rebex.Net.ISocketFactory)
member.summary: Sets the socket factory to be used to create communication sockets.
member.param: Socket factory.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3.Encoding
member.summary: Gets or sets the Encoding used to encode command arguments sent to the server and decode received answers.
member.value: The Encoding used to encode command arguments sent to the server and decode received answers. Default is Encoding.Default.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3.Settings
member.summary: Gets or sets POP3 object settings.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3.SupportedExtensions
member.summary: Gets the bit field specifying the extensions supported by the server.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3.GetSupportedAuthenticationMethods
member.summary: Gets the list of supported authentication methods.
member.returns: The list of supported authentication methods.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3.IsSecured
member.summary: Gets the value indicating whether the control connection is secured.
member.value: True if secure, false if not secure.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3.TlsSocket
member.summary: Returns the TLS/SSL socket of secured control connection.
member.returns: The TLS/SSL socket of secured control connection, or null if the connection is not secured.
member.remarks: This property is intended for advanced users only. class does not expect the socket to be altered in any way.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3.Timeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of time in milliseconds before the operation times out (specify -1 or 0 to indicate that the request does not time out).
member.value: The length of time, in milliseconds, until the operation times out, or the value -1 or 0 to indicate that the request does not time out. Default is 60000 (60 seconds).

remarks.p: The internal timeout counter is reset every time data is sent or received from to server.
The property affects both synchronous and asynchronous methods.
Minimal value is 1000. Setting this to a value lower than 1000 will set it to 1000.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3.AbortTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the length of time before the abort operation times out.
member.value: The length of time, in milliseconds, until the abort operation times out. Default is 3000, which seems to be a reasonable value.
member.remarks: Minimal value is 1000. Setting this to a value lower than 1000 will set it to 1000.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3.LocalEndPoint
member.summary: Gets the local client .

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3.RemoteEndPoint
member.summary: Gets the remote server .

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3.IsConnected
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the session is connected.

remarks.p: This property returns the latest known state of the session. When it returns false, the session was either never connected, or no longer connected. When it returns true, the session was connected at the time of the last I/O operation.
Note: There is no guarantee that the session is still connected even though returns true.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3.IsAuthenticated
member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether the session is authenticated.
member.value: A value indicating whether the session is authenticated.
member.remarks: Use this to detect whether the session has been automatically preauthenticated prior to calling the Login method.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3.IsBusy
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether there any operation (method) in progress.
member.returns: True if there is any operation in progress; false otherwise.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3.Version
member.summary: Returns the version of the POP3 component.
member.value: The version of the POP3 component.

member.summary: Gets the transfer state.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3TransferProgressEventArgs.BytesTransferred
member.summary: Gets the total number of bytes transferred during the current transfer.
member.remarks: This value is valid only when is not None.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3TransferProgressEventArgs.BytesSinceLastEvent
member.summary: Gets the number of bytes transferred during the current transfer since the last time the event was raised.
member.value: The number of bytes transferred since the last time the event was raised.
member.remarks: This value is valid only when is not None.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3TransferProgressEventArgs.#ctor(Rebex.Net.Pop3TransferState,System.Int64,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified state, number of bytes transferred during the current transfer and progress since the last time the event was raised.
member.param: Current state.
Number of bytes transferred. Ignored if state is Pop3TransferState.None.
Number of bytes transferred since the last time the event was raised. Ignored if state is Pop3TransferState.None.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus
member.summary: Defines status codes for the class.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.ConnectFailure
member.summary: The remote service point could not be contacted at the transport level.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.ConnectionClosed
member.summary: The connection was prematurely closed.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.SocketError
member.summary: The error at transport level occurred.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.NameResolutionFailure
member.summary: The name resolver service could not resolve the host name.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.Pending
member.summary: An operation is pending.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.ProtocolError
member.summary: The response received from the server was complete but indicated a protocol-level error.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.ProxyNameResolutionFailure
member.summary: The name resolver service could not resolve the proxy host name.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.OperationAborted
member.summary: The operation was aborted by a call to the method.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.UnclassifiableError
member.summary: An unclassifiable error occurred. This is the default value for .

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.ServerProtocolViolation
member.summary: The server response was not a valid POP3 response.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.Timeout
member.summary: No response was received during the time-out period for a request.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.AsyncError
member.summary: General exception in asynchronous call.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.LoginRequired
member.summary: The operation cannot be performed before a successful login.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus.OperationFailure
member.summary: The requested operation could not be completed.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.Pop3Exception
member.summary: The exception that is thrown when an error occurs while using Pop3 component.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3Exception.Status
member.summary: Gets the status of the response.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3Exception.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.remarks: This constructor initializes the Message property of the new instance to a message that describes the general error.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3Exception.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified error message.
member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3Exception.#ctor(System.String,Rebex.Net.Pop3ExceptionStatus)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified error message and status.
member.param: The message that describes the error.
One of the values.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3Exception.#ctor(System.String,System.Exception)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class with the specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that is the cause of this exception.
member.param: The message that describes the error.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3MessageCollection.Clone
member.summary: Creates a shallow copy of the .
member.returns: A shallow copy of the .
member.remarks: A shallow copy of a collection copies only the elements of the collection, whether they are reference types or value types, but it does not copy the objects that the references refer to. The references in the new collection point to the same objects that the references in the original collection point to.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.Pop3MessageInfo
member.summary: Contains information about a single mail message on the POP3 server.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3MessageInfo.SequenceNumber
member.summary: Gets the message sequence number.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3MessageInfo.Length
member.summary: Gets the length of the message.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3MessageInfo.UniqueId
member.summary: Gets the unique ID of the message.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3MessageInfo.HeadersParsed
member.summary: Gets the value indicating whether the message headers were parsed.
member.value: True if parsed; false if not.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3MessageInfo.HeadersParsingError
member.summary: Gets an error that occurred during message headers parsing.
member.value: An error that occurred during message headers parsing.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3MessageInfo.Date
member.summary: Gets the origination date of this message.
member.remarks: The origination date specifies the date and time at which the creator of the message indicated that the message was complete and ready to enter the mail delivery system.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3MessageInfo.From
member.summary: Gets the list of authors of this message.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3MessageInfo.Sender
member.summary: Gets the sender of this message. May be null.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3MessageInfo.ReplyTo
member.summary: Gets the list of addresses that should receive replies to this message.
member.value: The list of addresses that should receive replies.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3MessageInfo.To
member.summary: Gets the list of addresses of primary recipients of the message.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3MessageInfo.CC
member.summary: Gets the list of addresses of others who are to receive the message.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3MessageInfo.MessageId
member.summary: Gets the unique identifier of the message.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3MessageInfo.InReplyTo
member.summary: Gets the list of identifiers of messages to which the message is a reply.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3MessageInfo.Subject
member.summary: Gets the subject of the message.
member.remarks: This property contains a short string identifying the topic of the message.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3MessageInfo.Headers
member.summary: Gets the list of headers of this entity.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3MessageInfo.ReceivedDate
member.summary: Gets the received date of this message.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.Pop3Settings
member.summary: Specifies various POP3 settings.

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3Settings.#ctor
member.summary: Creates an instance of .

member.name: M:Rebex.Net.Pop3Settings.Clone
member.summary: Creates a new object that is a copy of the current instance.
member.returns: A new object that is a copy of the current instance.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3Settings.IgnoreUnparsableHeaders
member.summary: Ignore unparsable headers when parsing mail message.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3Settings.IgnoreUnparsableSignatures
member.summary: Ignore unparsable S/MIME signature entities when parsing mail message.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3Settings.DoNotAllowDuplicateUniqueIds
member.summary: Throw an exception if duplicate unique ID is encountered by the GetMessageList method. This was default behavior until Rebex Mail 1.0.3333.0 (inclusive).

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3Settings.IgnoreInvalidEndings
member.summary: Ignore invalid endings before the actual end of message data.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3Settings.DisableGmailRetrieveWorkaround
member.summary: Disables workaround for non-standard behavior of Gmail's RETR command.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3Settings.RaiseEventsFromCurrentThread
member.summary: Specifies whether to raise asynchronous events from the current working thread or whether to raise them using a available when an asynchronous operation was started.
member.value: False (default) to raise events using ; true to raise them directly form the current working thread.
member.remarks: Events of synchronous methods are always raised from the current working thread.

member.name: P:Rebex.Net.Pop3Settings.DisableApopAuthentication
member.summary: Explicitly disables APOP authentication.
member.value: True to disable the APOP authentication; false (default) to enable APOP.

member.name: T:Rebex.Net.Pop3Authentication
member.summary: POP3 authentication method.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Authentication.Auto
member.summary: Choose automatically.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Authentication.Plain
member.summary: RFC 2595 TLS plaintext authentication.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Authentication.DigestMD5
member.summary: RFC 2831 DIGEST-MD5 authentication.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Authentication.CramMD5
member.summary: RFC 2195 CRAM-MD5 authentication.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Authentication.Login
member.summary: Login authentication.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Authentication.ClearText
member.summary: Clear text USER/PASS login.

member.name: F:Rebex.Net.Pop3Authentication.APop
member.summary: APOP.

member.summary: Returns a value indicating whether the object is connected.

member.summary: Gets the Win32 socket error code.
